sentences.en: A loving man is always a jealous man.
sentences.cn: 钟情之人常是妒忌之人.

sentences.en: By and large, these people are peace-loving, law-abiding citizens.
sentences.cn: 大体上，这些人都是热爱和平、遵纪守法的公民。

sentences.en: He’s very loving and affectionate with his sister.
sentences.cn: 他很爱他的妹妹，和她很亲暱。

sentences.en: I will go on loving James through thick and thin no matter what happens.
sentences.cn: 不管发生什么，不管经历多少艰辛，我都会一直爱着詹姆斯。

sentences.en: Loving relationships will give a child an inner sense of security.
sentences.cn: 亲昵关系会给予孩子内心一种安全感。

sentences.en: Patients may not receive the tender, loving care once associated with a hospital stay.
sentences.cn: 病人们可能享受不到以前住院时那种悉心体贴的照顾。

sentences.en: She stared at her son studying at the desk with loving eyes.
sentences.cn: 她脉脉地注视着伏案苦读的儿子.

sentences.en: She was a warm and loving mother.
sentences.cn: 她是一位热情慈爱的母亲。

sentences.en: The children are very tactile with warm, loving natures.
sentences.cn: 小孩子说话时喜欢用上热烈、表达喜爱的肢体触碰。

sentences.en: The children there were very loving to me.
The girl's loving care spurred his recovery.
sentences.cn: 姑娘的悉心照料使他康复得很快.

sentences.en: The house has been restored with loving care.
We are energised by love if we put our energy into loving.
sentences.cn: 如果我们付出能量去表现爱意,爱就会使我们充满活力.

sentences.en: What that child needs is plenty of loving care .
sentences.cn: 那孩子所需要的是大量的关爱。

sentences.en: Work on the positive, creating beautiful, loving and fulfilling relationships.
sentences.cn: 致力于好的方面，努力营造美好的、友爱的、令人满意的关系。

words.tran_cn: 恋爱；亲爱的；酷爱；喜爱的事物

phrases.tran_cn: 亲切照料；细心看护；（英）（对病入膏肓的老年患者停止积极治疗的）安乐护理
成为更有爱心的人（诗歌标题）

trans.tran_cn: 爱的，表示爱意的，亲爱的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a way that shows you love someone

trans.tran_cn: 爱，热爱(love的现在分词)，喜爱，喜好，喜欢
